properties.title: Jena Hadoop RDF Tools (IP) Clearance Status

section.title: Jena Hadoop RDF Tools Property (IP) Clearance Status
Description
section.p: Hadoop RDF Tools is a set of new modules for the Apache Jena project which provide the necessary building blocks to make it easy to write Hadoop applications that consume/produce RDF.

ul.li: Which PMC will be responsible for the code: Apache Jena
Into which existing project/module: Apache Jena
Officer or member managing donation: Andy Seaborne

p.em: Completed tasks are shown by the completion date (YYYY-MM-dd).

section.title: Identify the codebase

tr.td: Attached to JENA-666 as Hadoop-RDF-Tools.patch which patches the Jena SVN in Experimental area at svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jena/Experimental/hadoop-rdf/ where the code will live until it is ready for inclusion in mainline Jena.

section.p: MD5 or SHA1 sum for donated software: SHA1(Hadoop-RDF-Tools.patch)= 5c06123ce4853c1f9674d4e3901f91d1c6331539 - MD5 (Hadoop-RDF-Tools.patch) = b10fd59e6049a5c9d0b3482a55f20240 - Both generated with OpenSSL 1.0.1e 11 Feb 2013

section.title: Copyright

tr.td: Code was developed by Rob Vesse (Apache ID rvesse) who is a PMC member on Apache Jena and has an ICLA on file and is being donated by his employer Cray Inc who have a CCLA on file that names him specifically.
All code files now have standard ASF headers, license headers added to other relevant files (POMs, XML etc). RAT report is clean.

section.p: Identify name recorded for software grant: N/A (See legal-discuss thread

section.title: Verify distribution rights
section.p: Corporations and individuals holding existing distribution rights:

tr.td: Single committer Rob Vesse (Apache ID rvesse) has an ICLA on file
Rob Vesse's employer Cray Inc has a CCLA on file that names him and has agreed to donate the code to the Apache Jena under the existing ICLA and CCLA
There is no non-Apache licensed code present in the donated software
All dependencies are other Apache projects or open source projects under the Apache License

section.title: Organizational acceptance of responsibility for the project

ul.li: Jena PMC Vote Result - Passed with 4 +1s from PMC Members, no -1s
Incuabtor Vote Result - Passed by Lazy Consensus from Incubator PMC Members, 0 +1s, no -1s
